name: 4000 Earths Later
description:
Important notice: game contains around 25% of whole story. New version will be loaded just after major update.

Known issues: -char positioning (requires correction) -text to long (requires correction) -spelling and grammar mistakes (fast mode, will be corrected).

4000 Earth later is a Visual Novel, representing SCIADV genre.

If you are a fun of Steins;Gate or Chaos;Head - you will find it interesting.
